General.Name: Inti Kapuas Arowana Tbk
General.Description: PT Inti Agri Resources Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the breeding and distribution of Arowana fishes in Indonesia. It primarily provides green and super red Arowana fishes under the ShelookRED brand name. The company operates five pond locations around Pontianak and two proshops in Jakarta. It also exports its products. The Company was formerly known as PT Inti Kapuas Arowana Tbk and changed its name to PT Inti Agri Resources Tbk in April 2008. PT Inti Agri Resources Tbk was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Jakarta Barat, Indonesia.
General.Address: Puri Britania Commercial Complex, Jakarta Barat, Indonesia, 11610
